short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of YouTube video durations spoiling the outcome of your favorite esports match or game recaps? Our extension has you covered!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your YouTube viewing experience by hiding video durations and progress bars. Perfect for esports enthusiasts who want to avoid spoilers. Simply toggle on/off as you wish. Dive into suspenseful matches without any hints!
